fix_attempts.description: Fix uint32 underflow in semantic token length for multiline ranges
Add FSharp.notifications.backgroundServiceProgress config option (default false) to suppress background analyzer progress notifications
Filter out get/set accessor keywords and deduplicate ranges in TextDocumentRename to prevent false positive renames
fix_attempts.build_status: succeeded net8.0 0 errors, 18/18 rename tests pass

fix_attempts.description: Add '{' to TriggerCharacters for completion to fix auto-complete inside interpolated string expressions
fix_attempts.build_status: succeeded net8.0 0 errors; test suite timed out (infrastructure limitation)

fix_attempts.description: Fix FilePathToUri to encode non-ASCII chars using UTF-8 byte sequences (%C3%B3 not %F3 for accented letters)
fix_attempts.build_status: succeeded net8.0 0 errors, 42/42 URI tests pass

fix_attempts.description: Disable InlineValueProvider by default (change InlineValuesConfig.Default.Enabled from Some true to None) to restore pipeline hints in normal editing
Wrap segments containing ' -> ' in parens in AddExplicitTypeAnnotation to fix ambiguous type annotations for tuples with function components
Use p.Display (TaggedText[] to string) instead of p.CanonicalTypeTextForSorting for signature help parameter Documentation, fixing fully-qualified type names like Microsoft.FSharp.Core.char

notes: Run 17 done. Fixed #1029 (parameter type display using CanonicalTypeTextForSorting). Commented on #822 (union cases already separate lines - suggest close), #744 (FCS GetMethods limitation for curried functions - outlined fix).
